segments.text: Speaking of classical music , we should never forget about the New Year's Concert of the Vienna Philharmonic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . People all over the world watch it on TV , or listen to it on the radio .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . It's one of the biggest classical music events . Have you ever been to the live show ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I went to the New Year â€™ s Concert in 2010 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , you're so lucky . I saw it on TV . But it must be so different to be there in the concert hall .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's for sure . You know , I had the greatest time ever .
segments.speaker: S2
